1.0.5.name: wordpress/wp-like-lock
1.0.5.description:
WP Like Lock allows site owners to 'lock' content on any Page, Post or Custom Post Type, until the site visitor clicks the Facebook Like button to then view the content.

Content can be locked in full or in part on a per-Post basis, in conjunction with global options to lock content by Post, Page, Custom Post Types or Taxonomy.
